"'Liaisons' really is such a terrific play. Hamptonâ€™s adaptation is just so good - full of passion, intrigue, betrayal, loss and gender politics. And all these themes wrapped within this well-known story of a pair of schemers in pre-Revolutionary France....But what excited me most was just how bitingly relevant the gender politics in the writing remains...This is a great revival of a terrific play with much in its message that still (sadly) resonates 30 years after it first opened."
